name: Catholic Charities Immigration Services
description: Affordable immigration legal services including citizenship, green cards, asylum, and family petitions
fullDescription: Catholic Charities provides affordable immigration legal services throughout the Bay Area, including help with citizenship, green cards, asylum, and family petitions.
whatTheyOffer:
- Citizenship and naturalization applications
- Green card applications and renewals
- Family-based petitions
- DACA applications and renewals
- Asylum applications
- Refugee resettlement services
- Low-cost legal consultations
howToGetIt:
1. Call your local Catholic Charities office
2. Schedule a legal consultation
3. Sliding scale fees based on income
4. Bring all immigration documents to appointment
5. Receive assistance with applications and representation
keywords: Catholic Charities, immigration, citizenship, green card, family petition, asylum, refugee, DACA, naturalization, low-cost legal
